subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: After a ninth-inning rain delay, a three-run homer by Justin Upton that gave the Padres an 8-7 lead, and another rain delay, the Mets went quietly.
snippet: After a ninth-inning rain delay, a three-run homer by Justin Upton that gave the Padres an 8-7 lead, and another rain delay, the Mets went quietly.
